    @pytest.mark.url("vps")
    @allure.title("跟单软件看板-VPS数据-删除策略账号")
    def test_delete_vpstrader(self, var_manager, logged_session):
        # 1. 发送删除策略账号请求
        vps_trader_id = var_manager.get_variable("vps_trader_id")
        response = self.send_delete_request(
            logged_session,
            '/subcontrol/trader',
            json_data=[vps_trader_id]
        )
    
        # 2. 验证响应状态码
        self.assert_response_status(
            response,
            200,
            "删除策略账号失败"
        )
    
        # 3. 验证JSON返回内容
>       self.assert_json_value(
            response,
            "$.msg",
            "success",
            "响应msg字段应为success"
        )

    def assert_json_value(self, response, json_path, expected_value, error_msg):
